item.title: Caya
item.description: Caya provides end-to-end document automation for German businesses, handling physical mail digitization, document classification, data extraction, and system integration.

item.title: Hyarchis
item.description: Hyarchis provides cloud-based KYC and document processing solutions for financial services, specializing in compliance management and client onboarding automation.

item.title: inovoo
item.description: inovoo provides low-code business process automation through its NOVO CxP platform, offering intelligent document processing for healthcare, finance, and government sectors.

item.title: myBiros
item.description: myBiros provides cloud-based intelligent document processing for insurance, financial services, and utilities, combining small language models with OCR and computer vision.

item.title: Ondox
item.description: Ondox provides AI-powered document processing for insurance, financial services, and government agencies using large language models including OpenAI GPT and Anthropic Claude.

item.title: Pulse
item.description: Pulse provides document processing and OCR infrastructure for financial services, healthcare, insurance, and legal sectors through layout-aware vision models.

item.title: ScaleHub
item.description: ScaleHub provides document processing combining AI automation with a global network of human contributors for high-volume document extraction.

item.title: Scry AI
item.description: Scry AI provides intelligent document processing, conversational AI, and IoT platforms for banking, insurance, real estate, energy, manufacturing, and government sectors.

item.title: LumoDoc by FortoLabs
item.description: LumoDoc is an advanced, Agentic AI-powered Intelligent Document Processing (IDP) solution engineered for high-precision data extraction and workflow automation across the global logistics industry.
